snippet: Peyton Manning threw for 403 yards and 5 touchdowns, four of them to Eric Decker, as the Broncos beat the Chiefs to move a game clear in the division.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos beat Kansas City Chiefs, 35-28; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning threw for 403 yards and 5 touchdowns, four of them to Eric Decker, as the Broncos beat the Chiefs to move a game clear in the division.

headline.main: Manning Helps Broncos Take Charge in A.F.C. West
headline.print_headline: Manning Helps Broncos Take Charge in A.F.C. West
